GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

GET /api/subcategories.description: serves an array of all subcategories

GET /api/events.description: serves an array of all events

GET /api/events/:event_id.description: serves a single event by event ID number

POST /api/events/:event_id/attendees.description: adds an attendee for an event

GET /api/venues.description: serves an array of all venues

GET /api/users/:user_id.description: serves a single user by User ID number

GET /api/organisations/:organisation_id/.description: serves an array of all events for a single organisation

GET /api/events/:event_id/attendees.description: serves an array of all attendees for a single event

POST /api/auth/login.description: authenticates a user with their email and password, returning an access token for secure API requests
